refnamediv.refpurpose: Computing function for one or more time steps.

listitem.para: (Output argument) Error code value : zero indicates that no errors occurred
MASCARET instance number returned by the function createMASCARET
Flag for writing on listing files (1-> write 0-> no write)

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Function for the simulation of one or more time steps. Compute a new hydraulic state with the help of the previous state and of the current model.
Another API function can also do the same job but with more arguments, it is computeMASCARET_BC

Before using this function, it is necessary to initialise the MASCARET state, calling one of the following functions initStateNameMASCARET, initStateMASCARET ou importXmlMASCARET with the last parameter set to 0 (zero).

refsection.title: Example
